amendatorysection.catchline: False or misleading information prohibited; updates required.
amendatorysection.para: No person subject to the Sex Offender Registration Act shall knowingly and willfully furnish any false or misleading information in the registration or fail to provide or timely update law enforcement of any of the information required to be provided by the act.

annotation.para: The phrase "knowingly and willfully" in this section applies only to the furnishing of false and misleading information and not to the failure to update information. State v. Clark, 22 Neb. App. 124, 849 N.W.2d 151 (2014).
